name: Dr. Transplanter
description:
This is a short demo of a game idea

Dr. Transplanter sees you playing as an evil magical being, who just so happens to be a great doctor. As a specialist in organ transplanting, you are always on the lookout for fresh organs to give to your patients. As you've discovered, the best place to get these organs is from people who are not really using them anymore.

Unfortunately the more organs you provide, the greater the demand for new organs becomes. In order to meet these demands, you must travel to locations with even tighter security.

Use your array of technologies alongside your mysterious abilities in order to secure the required number of organs. Also don't die in the process!

How to play:

Get the required number of organs without dying. Once you have collected them, leave the level by moving to the far left or far right of the map.

Featuring:

- Randomly Generated Levels
- Walking up walls and on ceilings!
- Assassinations by teleporting inside of people (yes seriously)
- A nifty revolver
- Old people
